name: place text
desc: Provides a means to interactively place 2D and 3D renderable text strings or to read an EMT file to place the text.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Import File
properties.desc: Import existing text from an *.pt (place_text) file.

properties.name: Reload Import File
properties.desc: The Reload Import File button forces the module to reload the Import File.

properties.name: Visible
properties.desc: Controls the visibility of the object.

properties.name: Export File
properties.desc: Export current text to an *.pt (place_text) file.

properties.name: Probe Action
properties.desc: Allows for the changing of the text center or for adding a new string at the probed location.  Only available when the viewer is connected.

properties.name: Forward Facing Style
properties.desc: Forward Facing Style allows the user to align the labels to an appropriate view and to alter the basic layout of the font.  These values are module wide so apply to all Forward Facing selected fonts.

properties.name: Trim White Space
properties.desc: The Trim White Space control when selected will remove leading and trailing spaces from all text

properties.name: Created Text
properties.desc: The Created Text allows the user to select a single text to edit.

properties.name: Remove Current Text
properties.desc: The Remove Current Text Button allows the user to remove the currently selected text from the list

properties.name: Current Text Values
properties.desc: The currently selected text from the Created Text.
